name: @switchboard-xyz/switchboard-v2
author: mitch@switchboard.xyz
description: API wrapper for intergating with the Switchboardv2 program

scripts.build:protos: pbjs -t static-module -o src/protos/index.js ../protos/*.proto && pbts -o src/protos/index.d.ts src/protos/index.js
scripts.build:cjs:protos: shx mkdir -p lib/cjs/protos; pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs -o lib/cjs/protos/index.js ../protos/*.proto && pbts -o lib/cjs/protos/index.d.ts lib/cjs/protos/index.js
scripts.build:esm:protos: shx mkdir -p lib/esm/protos; pbjs -t static-module -w "es6" -o lib/esm/protos/index.js ../protos/*.proto && pbts -o lib/esm/protos/index.d.ts lib/esm/protos/index.js
scripts.build:cjs: shx rm -rf lib/cjs && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && shx echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > lib/cjs/package.json && yarn build:cjs:protos
scripts.build:esm: shx rm -rf lib/esm && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && shx echo '{"type": "module"}' > lib/esm/package.json && yarn build:esm:protos
scripts.build: shx rm -rf lib && yarn build:protos && yarn build:cjs && yarn build:esm && shx rm lib/*.tsbuildinfo
